name: ServiceNow-CICD-SC-Apply
description: Apply changes from a remote source control to a specified local application
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: appScope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Required if app_sys_id is not specified.
The scope name of the application for which to apply the changes, such as x_aah_custom_app. You can locate this value in the scope field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: appSysId
inputs.label: sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Required if app_scope is not specified.
The sys_id of the application for which to apply the changes. You can locate this value in the Sys ID field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: branchName
inputs.label: Branch name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Name of the branch in the source control system from which to acquire the application.
Default: Default branch specified on the source control system.
